Peripheral Neuropathy: No change in next dose. Treatment of neuropathy symptoms may be offered as available in line with local standard of care. If a participant is receiving an ART drug associated with peripheral neuropathy (PN), stopping that particular drug and switching to an alternative nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor (NRTI) is recommended, where available.
Discontinue vincristine. Symptomatic treatments to treat neuropathy symptoms may be offered as available in line with local standard of care.
